alert.note: Alert for Graham; Logan; Sheridan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 09 at 2:36AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MDT/5 AM CDT/ EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall remains possible. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Kansas and west central Kansas, including the following counties, in northwest Kansas, Graham, Sheridan, Sherman and Thomas. In west central Kansas, Gove, Greeley, Logan, Wallace and Wichita. * WHEN...Until 4 AM MDT/5 AM CDT/ early this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Graham; Logan; Sheridan; Sherman; Thomas; Wallace
